arStrings.szText:
Gain a stacking bonus for each active {c_important}Conjuration{/c}, up to {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} stacks:
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_number}[{SF_2} * 100|%x|]{/c} Damage
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%+|]{/c} Movement Speed
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%x|]{/c} Mana Regeneration
Damage, Movement, and Mana Regeneration is increased.
